summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Performance Tab features for Team Lead and Admission Manager. All 23 backend tests passed. Frontend UI testing verified all features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: Team Lead has correct designation (Team Lead)
Backend: Manager has correct designation (Admission Manager)
Backend: Counselor has correct designation (Admission Counselor)
Backend: Team Lead can access /api/performance/stats (200 OK)
Backend: Manager can access /api/performance/stats (200 OK)
Backend: Regular counselor denied access to performance stats (403)
Backend: Team Lead sees only team admissions (0 admissions)
Backend: Manager sees all admissions (4 admissions)
Backend: Filter by counselor_id works
Backend: Filter by month (YYYY-MM) works
Backend: Filter by college_id works
Backend: Combined filters work correctly
Backend: Manager can get admissions list via /api/performance/admissions
Backend: Team Lead can get admissions list (team only)
Backend: Regular counselor denied access to performance admissions (403)
Backend: Team Lead can get assignable counselors (1 - themselves)
Backend: Manager can get all counselors (5 total)
Backend: Regular counselor denied access to targets/counselors (403)
Backend: Team Lead can assign target to team member
Backend: Manager can assign target to any counselor
Backend: Manager can get targets with progress
Backend: Team Lead can get targets progress (team only)
Backend: Manager sees >= admissions than Team Lead (data comparison)
Frontend: Performance tab visible in navbar for Team Lead
Frontend: Performance tab visible in navbar for Manager
Frontend: Performance tab NOT visible for regular counselor
Frontend: Team Lead sees 'My Team Performance' header
Frontend: Manager sees 'Team Performance' header
Frontend: Team Lead sees 0 total admissions (correct - team has no admissions)
Frontend: Manager sees 4 total admissions (correct - sees all)
Frontend: By Counselor filter works with dropdown options
Frontend: By Month filter works with dropdown options
Frontend: By College filter works with dropdown options
Frontend: Assign Target button visible for Team Lead
Frontend: Assign Target button visible for Manager
Frontend: Assign Target dialog opens with all fields
Frontend: Team Lead can only assign to 1 counselor (themselves)
Frontend: Manager can assign to all 5 counselors
Frontend: Target Progress shows progress bars with percentages
seed_data_creation: Database has existing targets: Demo Counselor (10 admissions, ₹5,00,000 fees - 1/10 = 10%, ₹1,00,000/₹5,00,000 = 20%), Test Team Lead (10 admissions - 0/10 = 0%). 4 total admissions exist.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Performance Tab features fully tested and working. Team Lead (teamlead@test.com) sees 'My Team Performance' with 0 admissions (team has no admissions). Manager (manager@test.com) sees 'Team Performance' with 4 total admissions. Both have access to filters (By Counselor, By Month, By College) and can assign targets. Team Lead can only assign to themselves (1 counselor), Manager can assign to all 5 counselors. Regular counselors do NOT see Performance tab. Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_performance_tab.py with 23 comprehensive tests.

details: Team Lead sees Performance tab in navbar
Admission Manager sees Performance tab in navbar
Regular counselor does NOT see Performance tab
Team Lead sees only team's admissions (0 in this case)
By Counselor filter works with dropdown
By College filter works with dropdown
Team Lead can assign targets to team members only (1 counselor)
Manager can assign targets to any counselor (5 counselors)
Target dialog has all fields: Counselor, Period Type, Period, Admissions Target, Fees Target
Progress bars show admissions count and fees collected progress
